mapper.select: select count(cdr.id) from cor_driver cdr inner join cor_user_profile cup on cdr.user_id = cup.user_id and cup.dr = 0 inner join cor_driver_scooter cds on cdr.id = cds.driver_id and cds.dr = 0 left join cor_tenant_scooter cts on cds.scooter_id = cts.scooter_id and cts.dr = 0

select cdr.id as id, cdr.status as status, cdr.user_id as userId, cup.picture as avatar, cup.place_birth as address, cup.first_name as driverFirstName, cup.last_name as driverLastName, cup.email_1 as email, cup.nickname as nickname, cup.country_code_1 as countryCodel, cup.tel_number_1 as driverPhone, cts.license_plate as plateNumber, cdr.def1 as activatBoolean, case when cup.email_1 is null then '2' ELSE '1' END loginType from cor_driver cdr inner join cor_user_profile cup on cdr.user_id = cup.user_id and cup.dr = 0 inner join cor_driver_scooter cds on cdr.id = cds.driver_id and cds.dr = 0 left join cor_tenant_scooter cts on cds.scooter_id = cts.scooter_id and cts.dr = 0
group by id, status, userId, avatar, address, driverFirstName, driverLastName, email, nickname, loginType, countryCodel, driverPhone, plateNumber, activatBoolean
order by cdr.status desc, cdr.def1 desc
limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select cd.status, count(*) totalCount from cor_driver cd where cd.dr = 0 and cd.tenant_id=#{tenantId} and cd.status != '3' group by cd.status

select trace.status, count(*) totalCount from cor_delivery_trace trace inner join cor_driver cd on trace.user_id = cd.user_id where trace.dr = 0 and trace.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and trace.status in ('3', '5', '6', '7') and cd.id = #{id} group by trace.status

select trace.delivery_id as id, delivery.order_no as orderNo, trace.status as status, delivery.recipient as recipient, trace.created_time as createdTime, delivery.ata as completeTime from cor_delivery_trace trace inner join cor_driver cd on trace.user_id = cd.user_id and cd.dr = 0 inner join cor_delivery delivery on trace.delivery_id = delivery.id and delivery.dr = 0 where trace.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and trace.dr = 0 and cd.id = #{id} and trace.status in ( '3', '5', '6', '7' ) order by delivery.created_time ASC limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from cor_driver_scooter_history cdsh inner join cor_tenant_scooter cts on cdsh.scooter_id = cts.scooter_id and cts.dr = 0 where cdsh.status = 2 and cdsh.dr=0 and cdsh.tenant_id=#{tenantId} and cdsh.driver_id=#{id}

select count(*) from cor_driver_scooter scooter inner join cor_driver_scooter_history histroy on scooter.scooter_id = histroy.scooter_id and scooter.begin_time = histroy.begin_time inner join cor_tenant_scooter tscooter on scooter.scooter_id = tscooter.scooter_id where scooter.status = 1 and histroy.driver_id = #{id} and histroy.tenant_id = #{tenantId}

select histroy.id as id, histroy.begin_time as assignTime, histroy.end_time as removeTime, tscooter.license_plate as licensePlate, ifnull(histroy.mileage, 0) as mileage from cor_driver_scooter scooter inner join cor_driver_scooter_history histroy on scooter.scooter_id = histroy.scooter_id and scooter.begin_time = histroy.begin_time inner join cor_tenant_scooter tscooter on scooter.scooter_id = tscooter.scooter_id where scooter.status = 1 and histroy.driver_id = #{id} and histroy.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
order by histroy.begin_time desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}

select cdsh.driver_id as id, cts.license_plate as licensePlate, cdsh.begin_time as assignTime, cdsh.end_time as removeTime, cdsh.mileage as mileage from cor_driver_scooter_history cdsh inner join cor_tenant_scooter cts on cdsh.scooter_id = cts.scooter_id and cts.dr = 0 where cdsh.status = 2 and cdsh.dr=0 and cdsh.tenant_id=#{tenantId} and cdsh.driver_id=#{id}
order by assignTime desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}

select sum(delivery.driven_mileage) from cor_delivery delivery left join cor_driver driver on delivery.deliverer_id = driver.user_id where delivery.status in (5,6) and delivery.updated_time between #{beginTime} and NOW() and delivery.tenant_id=#{enter.tenantId} and driver.id=#{enter.id}
SELECT model FROM cor_tenant_scooter WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND dr = 0 GROUP BY model

select driver.id as id, profile.FIRST_NAME as driverFirstName, profile.LAST_NAME as driverLastName, profile.PICTURE as avatar, count(detail.status in (1, 2)) as count from cor_driver driver inner join cor_user_profile profile on driver.user_id = profile.USER_ID and profile.dr = 0 left join cor_express_delivery delivery on delivery.driver_id = driver.id and delivery.dr = 0 and delivery.status in (1, 2) left join cor_express_delivery_detail detail on detail.express_delivery_id = delivery.id and detail.dr = 0 and detail.status in (1, 2) where driver.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and driver.status = 2 and driver.dr = 0 group by id , driverFirstName , driverLastName , avatar
